<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Information describing a function or inlined call site introduced by</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// directives used with this function&#39;s id or the id of an inlined call site</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// within this function or inlined call site.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo">MCCVFunctionInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this represents an inlined call site, then ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the parent function id plus one. If this represents a normal function,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// then there is no parent, and ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be FunctionSentinel.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this struct is an unallocated slot in the function info vector, then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a6501b119f7ba7b15237d1f43dd16ccbc"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a6501b119f7ba7b15237d1f43dd16ccbc">ParentFuncIdPlusOne</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a483f476cd95fc83549dce653648091bbab32b95a936d6a5df6c580b24b5a4b1f1"><Highlight kind="normal">  enum : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a483f476cd95fc83549dce653648091bbab32b95a936d6a5df6c580b24b5a4b1f1">FunctionSentinel</a> = ~0U &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
